title: Lol Client not closing properly
body: recently and rarely in the past when I go into my processes in game it says that the client is still open as well as the game when the client SHOULD close when the game goes into loading screen and I have a pretty poor computer so this affects my fps greatly I get a maximum of about 30 when this happens and if I close the lol client from processes when the game is over the client will not reopen and I have to manually do with the before mentioned poor computer takes about 5 minutes and I shouldn't have to do that everytime just because the client doesn't work properly
